Articles.Content:
Well, it makes sense. Soviets were the ones who won on that day.

Yeah... We can't discuss politics on this forum so let me just say that by Polish law public displaying of symbols of fascism (swastika) or communism (such as hammer and sickle or other Soviet symbols) is forbidden under penalty of restriction of liberty or imprisonment. Guess why. I have deep respect for Soviet space program, its engineers and kosmonauts and spacecraft, but USSR foreign policy... well, let's not dwelve on that.

Edited May 9, 2014 by czokletmuss
I'm an american. I'm sure the stupid R-Tard politicians don't like that day.

Yeah... We can't discuss politics on this forum so let me just say that by Polish law public displaying of symbols of fascism (swastika) or communism (such as hammer and sickle or other Soviet symbols) is forbidden under penalty of restriction of liberty or imprisonment. Guess why. I have deep respect for Soviet space program, its engineers and kosmonauts and spacecraft, but USSR foreign policy... well, let's not dwelve on that.

Is this celebration in Poland? Nope. Russians have a different attitude towards Soviet Union. And in that case, credit is where credit's due. As bad as they were, if it wasn't for them, it'd be even worse. This is a celebration of Soviet victory in WWII, it was Red Army that won that day, regardless of what we think of it today.

Is this celebration in Poland? Nope. Russians have a different attitude towards Soviet Union. And in that case, credit is where credit's due. As bad as they were, if it wasn't for them, it'd be even worse. This is a celebration of Soviet victory in WWII, it was Red Army that won that day, regardless of what we think of it today.

Sure thing - Russians can do whatever they please in their own country. I'm not surprised that if someone's grandpa died during WW2 defending USSR from Nazis he don't see a problem with hammer and sickle. And yes, mainly thanks to the Red Army the Allies won. Which doesn't change my surprise when i saw these symbols there.

Anyways, let's focus on the space exploration and great work done by MrTheBull - in space there are no borders and no politics. And let's hope it won't change

- in space there are no borders and no politics. And let's hope it won't change

Hope being the operative word.

Hello guys. Explanation is wery simple. These symbols are war orders (medails).

Fist is Order of Victory.

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Order_of_Victory

Second is Order of Patriotic War 1st class.

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Order_of_the_Patriotic_War.

Edited May 13, 2014 by maxmiztejm
But saying that they will not write about politics. (Bad translation)
I got rid of the voskhod till the IVA comes out cause it is killing my game.
Any updates on anything? Haven't heard anything in a while...

MrTheBull

Could you give an alternative download link to the mods sometimes soon? Spaceport will be shut down today and the current links won't be available.
Is there any way the Vostok mod can be updated for latest KSP build? Career mode..
You have a very good point. And either MrTheBull is hard at work still on the IVA(very unlikely), Preparing a surprise, or just simply taking a break, which, I don't doubt.

Does anyone still have the files from these parts? In particular, Vostok and Voskhod?

I was trying to search for web archived links, but couldn't find one with an active download.

ie.

http://web.archive.org/web/20140330063933/http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/0-21-1-vostok-spacecraft-pre-release/#tab_installation

Anyone have mirror download link? I very miss it :-(
I still have the Vostok and it still works, however the IVA is badly messed up.

I still have the Vostok and it still works

Can you upload on some website and send me a link?(Or .zip can send in email?)
New download links

New download links

what do you mean? the links are still there.

what do you mean? the links are still there.

No, I mean, long ago, MrTheBull was working on ze Voskhod. Now he has dissapeared without a trace. But I see that this happens a lot.

Hey Bull, when I try to use the Vostok Rocket .craft it says that the Soyuz 1st stage lateral booster, the 2nd stage and the 3rd stage decoupler are missing, but I have them and they work separately. Do you know what's up?
